Package it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CatchController
    This class handles the checking of the catch actions of the players
    Controller
    Class for checking the correctness of the action of the players, according to MVC pattern
    PowerUpController
    This class handles the draught, the discard and the use of a power up card by a player
    RoundController  
    RunController
    This class handles the run action by a player and checks where it can move to.
    ShootController
    This class handles the request of shoot by a player to another one.
    TestCatchController  
    TestController  
    TestPowerUpController  
    TurnController  
    WeaponController
    This class checks the right use of a weapon.
